dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, June 02, 2005 4:42 PM
To: copyright@abbywinters.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement
Date: Wed, 01 Jun 2005 22:42:34 -0500
From: Aaron Goldblatt <copyright@abbywinters.com>
To: dmitryx@list.ru, abuse@theplanet.com

This message is being sent to the domain contact of zetmovies.com and the
abuse address at ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

My name is Aaron Goldblatt, and I am Copyright Liaison for Abbywinters Pty
Ltd., an Austrailian company operating an adult website at
http://www.abbywinters.com/.

The operator of zetmovies.com is infringing on Abbywinters Pty Ltd.'s
copyright by unauthorized use of our adult images.  Specifically, the images
of the woman in pink at http://zetmovies.com/galls/5c32b6/ are
abbywinters.com images of our model Kerry K.  Any and all images of this
woman are the exclusive property of Abbywinters Pty Ltd., and you do not
have permission to reproduce them, especially without our copyright legend
(which, I note, has been stripped from the displayed images).

zetmovies.com resolves to 70.85.72.34.  ARIN's IP assignment database
identifies the owner of that IP as ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

We therefore request your assistance in removing these images in compliance
with international copyright law.

If you have any questions I can be reached at this email address.

Thank you very much.



Aaron Goldblatt
copyright@abbywinters.com



- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCn30lvK/XpJs6oyURAlH1AJ4jHjuZ5lTkTyD0DbrTRGjMENNydACePL5U
6Zy8MkNamibgsRvB0r+45NI=
=tZJZ
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
